name: Odin, Father of the Aesir
text:
1 Tuner + 2+ non-Tuner monsters
You can activate this effect; for the rest of this turn, any Spell/Trap effects that would affect a Divine-Beast-Type monster(s) will be negated while this card is face-up on the field. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because this face-up card on the field was destroyed and sent to there this turn: You can Special Summon this card. When Summoned this way: You can draw 1 card.
